To install and start Ganache, follow these steps:

1. Download the installation package from https://truffleframework.com/ganache/
2. Install the package.
3. Open the program, and you will see the interface displaying accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
4. Click on "Settings" to customize parameters such as IP, port (set to 8545), number of accounts, and gas limit.
5. Click on "restart" for the settings to take effect.

After following these steps, Ganache will be running a private Ethereum network on your local machine, bound to port 8545.
